channel.title: Making A Server
channel.description:
I made a ip on www.no-ip.com and i am trying to make a server for me and 2 friends but no one can get on it but me :S
And some of the things i have for the server. When i click it it says Java Restarting server not found ?
And i cant get a Server working :( Can some one help ?

item.title: Making A Server
item.dc:creator: @Redzz Redzz
item.description:
@Redzz wrote:

fred123456:

Ok ppls dont be noobs to portforword simply u need enternet connected with 2 comps and winodws xp go to run at start put cmd on run enter put ipconfig enter type in ur ip adreass and defaultgetaway they have to start with 192.168. and so on type ur default getaway on the etnernet do not add www. or .com press enter then for username type admin password leave it blank when u log in go to advanced type in ur ip then ur ip adreass starts with 192.168. then leave computer name and shit go to portforword put 43594 in both and traffic type any now stfu

wtf?.. to many spelling mistakes and… I don’t get it.

Read full topic

Ok ppls dont be noobs to portforword simply u need enternet connected with 2 comps and winodws xp go to run at start put cmd on run enter put ipconfig enter type in ur ip adreass and defaultgetaway they have to start with 192.168. and so on type ur default getaway on the etnernet do not add www. or .com press enter then for username type admin password leave it blank when u log in go to advanced type in ur ip then ur ip adreass starts with 192.168. then leave computer name and shit go to portforword put 43594 in both and traffic type any now stfu

item.title: Making A Server
item.dc:creator: @neato4440 neato4440
item.description:
@neato4440 wrote:

1.go to www.portforward.com
2.go to where its says Oor and click routers
3.look for your router
4.after u click ur router click on 1st SMTP Server
5.follow the steps they give u after u click 1st smtp server
hope this helps

Read full topic

item.title: Making A Server
item.dc:creator: @Redzz Redzz
item.description:
@Redzz wrote:

Wow wtf, you guys please read tutorials and DON’T ask again.
All you do is:
Control Panel > Windows Firewall > Exceptions > Add Port…
Then type your stupid port for your game.

Read full topic

haw do i make the ip my one[/quote]
